title: Looking for good players to play with!
body: oh wait there arent any good players cos this servers full of shitters and retards who cant play as a team. incompetent shits everywhere and this servers infested by foreigner chinese rats who build full glass-cannon, feed and talk about everyone's fathers and mothers lol hehexd oce

replies.body: I'm probably one of the incompetents, can't land a point and click to save my life. {{item:3070}}
